replies.msg:
Bloomberg:

U.S. stocks dropped in thin trading and Treasuries rose as political unrest in Hong Kong hit markets already on edge over trade tensions.

https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2019-08-11/stocks-to-dip-after-u-s-drop-as-caution-reigns-markets-wrap


USA Today

Hong Kong’s Hang Seng lagged and shed 0.4% as that city continues to deal with increased tensions from pro-democracy protests. The Hong Kong airport shut down on Monday when thousands of demonstrators occupied its main terminal.

https://www.usatoday.com/story/money/2019/08/12/stock-market-global-stocks-gain-amid-us-china-trade-war-fears/1984586001/

CNBC 兩篇文

Dow drops 250 points as US-China trade, Hong Kong protest tensions rise.

https://www.cnbc.com/2019/08/12/stock-market-wall-street-in-focus-after-china-fixes-yuan-at-stronger-than-expected-level.html

Global investors should be more concerned about the fallout from anti-government protests in Hong Kong than the U.S.-China trade war, CNBC’s Jim Cramer said Monday, hours after the city’s main airport canceled all flights do to demonstrations.

https://www.cnbc.com/2019/08/12/cramer-hong-kong-protests-more-serious-than-us-china-trade-war.html

看完了，欣慰的是，國際社會一直認同香港人的價值和國際地位，但我們應該要更團結去準備更大的挑戰 -- 大陸同港共的夜郎自大，各式各樣的打壓。
